block.name: Extras: Channel Access Controller
block.doc:
Channel access controller. Two msg inputs. One port sets the state of the channel. The other takes blobs and queues them, passing them to the output only when the last state received on first port is "0".
channel_access_controller - monitors control input and saves most recent value. Holds incoming blobs of state is anything other than 0. Otherwise, it sends blobs upstream.
